params.pairId: The pair to link records in

params.idA: Record identifier on endpoint A to unlink

createPair(bytes32,string,bytes32,bytes3.notice: Create a new sync pair between two endpoints

link(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Link two records across endpoints in a sync pair

pairExists(bytes32).notice: Check whether a sync pair exists

sync(bytes32).notice: Trigger a sync operation for a pair

unlink(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Unlink a record from a sync pair
